Privacy

This is a simple privacy statement you can adapt. Keep it aligned with whatever tools you actually use.

Newsletter

If you subscribe, your email address is used only to send you new posts. You can unsubscribe at any time.

Analytics

If analytics are enabled, they should be privacy-friendly and used only to understand which pages are useful. Avoid collecting unnecessary personal data.

Contact

If you add a contact email later, include it here.
